price: Hwan na ͻyε nnipa bͻneni kyεn obi a otwa nkontompo to Nyankopͻn soͻ, anaasε ͻnnye Nokorε no nnie wͻ aberε a (Nokorε no) aba nehͻ? Enti εnyε bonsam gya no mu na εyε atenaeε ma boniayεfoͻ no?
arabic: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوۡ كَذَّبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُۥٓۚ أَلَيۡسَ فِي جَهَنَّمَ مَثۡوٗى لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waman aẓlamu mimmani if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban aw kadhaba bil-ḥaqi lammā jāahu alaysa fī jahannama mathwan lil'kāfirīna
